name: Prabin C. Shrestha
bio: Hi — I'm Prabin. I build useful web applications and enjoy collaborating on open-source projects. I'm interested in full-stack development, data visualization and developer tools.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: A full-stack task management app with authentication and real-time updates.

projects.title: Data Viz Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard built with D3.js using public datasets.
